description: black; long sleeves; two vertical stitched bands, front and back, extending over shoulders--tan zigzag lines flanking two pairs of dotted lines with maroon and tan short horizontal line band at center; roughly arrow-shaped gold embroidered central element, bordered with triangular chain link elements, shell fragments, orange beads and coins
medium: Cotton, metallic threads, metal, coins, sequins, beads, shells; needlework
